item.description:
Time to put on the dancing shoes, and get out of the house.

Lots of great people, and new faces having a great time.

Large dance floor / Hot & Cold Hor D'ouevres / Great Music

Plenty of free parking / $7 cover till 8:30 then $10 after so get there early! 

Doors open at 8PM   Proper dress required.

Check out WhatsAngeloDoing.com for further info
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a couple of tables reserved with Newburyport on them
item.why: It's been a long crazy winter, and spring is just around the corner. Let's get together and have some fun. Last years dances averaged over 150 people from all over and it's a great meet and greet, so hope you can make it.
item.name: Time to come out of hibernation, and dance the night away!
